cinnamon.engine.gfx

Class ShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.gfx.ShaderManager

  • public final class ShaderManager
extends Object

    Manages the lifecycle of ShaderPrograms and shader objects as well as provides program lookup.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ShaderManager.ShaderProgram
      An OpenGL shader program.
      static class  ShaderManager.ShaderType
      Constants representing shader types.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderManager()
      Constructs a ShaderManager.

      Creates a named shader object of the specified shader type from the given source.
      void createProgram(String programName, String... shaderNames)
      Creates a shader program with the given name and attached to the shader objects referred to by the given shader object names.

      Deletes all shader objects.

      Deletes all ShaderPrograms.

      Gets the shader program of the given name.

      Gets the number of linked shader programs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShaderManager

        public ShaderManager()

        Constructs a ShaderManager.

    • Method Detail

      • createObject

        public void createObject(String name,
                         String source,
                         ShaderManager.ShaderType type)

        Creates a named shader object of the specified shader type from the given source.

        Parameters:
        name - name.
        source - GLSL source.
        type - kind of shader.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either name, source, or type is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given name is already in use.

      • createProgram

        public void createProgram(String programName,
                          String... shaderNames)

        Creates a shader program with the given name and attached to the shader objects referred to by the given shader object names.

        This method should only be called from the OpenGL thread.

        Parameters:
        programName - shader program name.
        shaderNames - shade objects' names.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if program name was null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if at least one of the given shader names does not refer to a shader object.

      • deleteAllShaderObjects

        public void deleteAllShaderObjects()

        Deletes all shader objects.

      • deleteAllShaderPrograms

        public void deleteAllShaderPrograms()

        Deletes all ShaderPrograms.

      • getProgram

        public ShaderManager.ShaderProgram getProgram(String name)

        Gets the shader program of the given name.

        Parameters:
        name - program name.
        Returns:
        shader program, or null if none matched the name.

      • getProgramCount

        public int getProgramCount()

        Gets the number of linked shader programs.

        Returns:
        shader program count.
